Combat_Training:_Defensive.help: You are more evasive to melee attacks.

Tactical_Training:_Maneuvers.help: A good leader knows how to protect his team. While active, this power increases the Defense of yourself and all nearby teammates to all attacks.
Tactical_Training:_Maneuvers.targetHelp: Your Defense to all attacks is improved due to good teamwork and leadership.

Indomitable_Will.help: When you toggle on this power, it grants protection from Sleep, Disorient, Fear, Immobilize, Confusions, Repel, Knockback and Hold effects. Indomitable Will also grants moderate resistance to Psionic based attacks. Recharge: Fast
Indomitable_Will.shortHelp: Toggle: Self Res (Psionics, Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Sleep, Fear, Confuse, Repel, Knockback).
Indomitable_Will.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} protects you from Immobilization, Sleep, Disorient, and Hold effects and improves your resistance to psionic damage.

Tactical_Training:_Assault.help: While this power is active, you and your nearby teammates deal more damage and are more resistant to Taunt and Placate.
Tactical_Training:_Assault.targetHelp: Your attack damage is improved due to good leadership and teamwork. You are resistant to Taunt and Placate.
Tactical_Training:_Assault.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's damage potential and resistance to Taunt and Placate.
Tactical_Training:_Assault.victimHit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's damage potential and resistance to Taunt and Placate.

Tactical_Training:_Leadership.help: While this power is active, your chance to hit and that of all your nearby teammates' is increased. Your advanced Tactics also protect you and your team from Confuse and Fear effects, as well as your Perception so you can detect Stealthy foes.
Tactical_Training:_Leadership.shortHelp: Toggle: PBAoE, Team +To Hit, Res(Confuse, Fear), +Perception
Tactical_Training:_Leadership.targetHelp: Your chance to hit and Perception is improved due to good teamwork and Leadership.
Tactical_Training:_Leadership.attackerHit: Your Tactical Training increases your team's chance to hit and Perception.
Tactical_Training:_Leadership.victimHit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's chance to hit and Perception with their Tactical Training.

Foresight.help: Widows who possess Foresight are resistant to Psionic Damage, as well as Sleep, Hold, Immobilization, Disorient, Confuse and Fear effects. Their precognition becomes clearer in times of duress, providing resistance to all damage types based on their current health, as well. They also have improved Defense, due to being able to see attacks slightly before they actually occur.
Foresight.shortHelp: Auto: Self Res (Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Sleep, Fear, Confuse, Psionics, Special), +Def (all)
